title: Mobile-Based Open Advanced Mathematics Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning process using mobile apps and web-based platforms in a BYOD environment. Provides customized content reflecting real-time formative assessment results.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of multivariate calculus with 85%+ accuracy through mobile quizzes.
Learners can evaluate peers' problem-solving processes using five or more qualitative criteria (e.g., logical coherence, creativity) via a peer assessment system.
Learners enhance collaborative skills by sharing mathematical reasoning processes with peer learners at least three times weekly in mobile discussion forums.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
